channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Is the Outright Ban on a US Central Bank Digital Currency (CBDC) a Mistake?
item.description: Instead of outright banning a US CBDC, wouldn’t it be preferrable to establish clear and enforceable legislative guardrails?

item.title: Elon Musk’s latest plan to add Venmo-like payments to X excludes crypto
item.description: New details have emerged of Musk's plans to launch X Payments, part of a bid to create "an everything app."

item.title: Concerned About Market Concentration and Lofty Valuations? Consider Small Caps
item.description: Investors are showing increased concern about large-cap stocks due to high market concentration and lofty stock valuations. Other factors combine to make a compelling case for small caps.

item.title: Beware, finance bros: AI is coming for banking before any other kinds of jobs, Citigroup warns
item.description: AI will “profoundly change money,” Citigroup says, and create plenty of “losers” along the way.

item.title: What Is Systems Thinking? A Primer with Applications for Sustainable Investing
item.description: Systems thinking is gaining in popularity in many fields including economics, finance, and investment management. Learn what it means and how it's being applied to sustainable investing.

item.title: The ‘affordability crisis’ has long plagued renters—but now it’s coming for homeowners
item.description: Nearly one in four homeowners are now “stretched worryingly thin,” states a new Harvard University report.

item.title: Book Review: My Value Creation Journey
item.description: Bartley J. Madden has produced a book that challenges business leaders and investment professionals to think outside the box systematically to solve difficult problems.

item.title: I’ve been practicing medicine at a renowned institution for 40 years. Society isn’t ready for us to reverse the aging process across an entire population
item.description: Dr. Joel Geiderman is convinced there is a biological mechanism that triggers the onset of aging and with enough research, we will discover what it is. Sooner, rather than later.

item.title: Private Markets’ Governance: A New Era
item.description: Now that the SEC Private Fund Adviser rules have been struck down, it's incumbent on the industry to demonstrate how private ordering can work.

item.title: Amazon got blasted by environmental groups for years over using reams of plastic. Now it’s switching to recycled paper packaging
item.description: The e-commerce giant said it already switched more than 95% of its packaging in North American to the new paper alternative.
